h1.div: Nezperce School District - Corona Virus Updates

div.p: Please check our website regularly for updates. If you are a parent, guardian, student or patron, please consider following our Facebook page and ensure that your contact information is up to date so that we can communicate quickly and accurately.

div.p: Please use this link to our District site to find all documents required by Idaho Code (IC 33-357, IC 33-320) to be posted on our website. These documents include: contracts, expenditures, annual budgets, master agreement, and our strategic plans

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: The Nezperce School District #302 does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. Superintendent, Dennis Kachelmier has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies.
